entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023
